channel.title: Comments on: How to use Zapya on Windows Phone to transfer files.

item.title: By: MCCshreyas
item.dc:creator: MCCshreyas
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://shreyasjejurkar.github.io/testwebsite/2016/04/02/how-to-use-zapya-on-windowsphone-to-transfer-files/#comment-113">nithin</a>.
No. That's not possible though. You will need a Hotspot between them. Like Android phone hotspot
item.content:encoded:
In reply to nithin.

No. That’s not possible though. You will need a Hotspot between them. Like Android phone hotspot
